Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
Vehicle
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMovable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Car, Truck
public abstract class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMovable
Object capable of moving with attributes and functionality that a real life vehicle would be expected to have.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected boolean movable
    If the vehicle can be moved.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Vehicle​(java.awt.Color color, java.lang.String modelName, int nDoors, double enginePower, double posX, double posY)
    Constructor which sets attributes to given values.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void brake​(double amount)
    Makes the vehicle decelerate, decreases its current speed.
    void gas​(double amount)
    Makes the vehicle accelerate, increases its current speed.
    double getCurrentSpeed()
    Returns the current total velocity of the vehicle.
    double getDirection()
    Returns the current direction of the vehicle's velocity in radians.
    double getEnginePower()
    Returns the engine power of the vehicle.
    int getNrDoors()
    Returns the number of doors on the vehicle.
    java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getPos()
    Returns the position of the vehicle.
    void move()
    Updates the vehicle's position in the 2D plane according to it's currentSpeed and direction.

    protected void setDirection​(double angle)
    Sets direction

    Returns the factor by which the speed should be modified when it accelerates/decelerates.
    void startEngine()
    Sets the currentSpeed to 0.1.
    void stopEngine()
    Sets the current speed of the vehicle to 0.
    void turnLeft()
    Makes the vehicle turn 90 degrees to the left.
    void turnRight()
    Makes the vehicle turn 90 degrees to the right.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle​(java.awt.Color color, java.lang.String modelName, int nDoors, double enginePower, double posX, double posY)
      Constructor which sets attributes to given values.
      Parameters:
      color - color of vehicle
      modelName - model name of vehicle
      nDoors - nr of doors on the vehicle
      enginePower - engine power of vehicle
      posX - position in x-axis
      posY - position in y-axis

      public double getCurrentSpeed()
      Returns the current total velocity of the vehicle.
      Returns:
      current velocity of the vehicle

    • startEngine

      public void startEngine()
      Sets the currentSpeed to 0.1. Used to change the currentSpeed from 0.

    • stopEngine

      public void stopEngine()
      Sets the current speed of the vehicle to 0. Makes the vehicle stop moving.

    • getPos

      public java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getPos()
      Returns the position of the vehicle.
      Returns:
      a Point with x and y coordinates

    • getDirection

      public double getDirection()
      Returns the current direction of the vehicle's velocity in radians.
      Returns:
      the vehicle's velocity's direction in radians

    • speedFactor

      protected abstract double speedFactor()
      Returns the factor by which the speed should be modified when it accelerates/decelerates.
      Returns:
      factor to modify currentSpeed with during acceleration/deceleration

    • move

      public void move()
      Updates the vehicle's position in the 2D plane according to it's currentSpeed and direction.
      Specified by:
      move in interface IMovable

    • turnLeft

      public void turnLeft()
      Makes the vehicle turn 90 degrees to the left. Increases the vehicle's direction by PI/2 radians.
      Specified by:
      turnLeft in interface IMovable

    • turnRight

      public void turnRight()
      Makes the vehicle turn 90 degrees to the right. Decreases the vehicle's direction by PI/2 radians.
      Specified by:
      turnRight in interface IMovable

    • gas

      public void gas​(double amount)
      Makes the vehicle accelerate, increases its current speed. Only accepts
      Parameters:
      amount - amount to increase the vehicle's speed by (between 0 and 1)
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if amount is not between 0 and 1

    • brake

      public void brake​(double amount)
      Makes the vehicle decelerate, decreases its current speed.
      Parameters:
      amount - amount to decrease the vehicle's speed by (between 0 and 1)
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if amount is not between 0 and 1
